mapper.select: select memberID, count(planTitle) as numOfPlans, sum(days) as totalDays, CAST(avg(days) AS signed integer) as avgDays, min(days) as minPlanDays, max(days) as maxPlanDays from (select tbl_Member.Member_ID as memberID, tbl_Plan.Plan_Title as planTitle, TO_DAYS(Plan_EndDate)-to_days(Plan_StartDate) as days from tbl_Member join tbl_Plan on tbl_Member.Member_ID = .tbl_Plan.Member_ID where tbl_Member.Member_ID = #{memberID} group by tbl_Plan.Plan_ID ) newTbl group by newTbl.memberID

#특정한 유저의 플랜만 뽑아서 그 플랜을 좋아요 누른 사람들의 수를 뽑아낸다. select Plan_Title as plan_title, count(UsersPlans.Plan_ID) as num from tbl_Like join (select Plan_ID, Plan_Title from tbl_Plan where tbl_Plan.Member_ID = #{memberID})UsersPlans on tbl_Like.Plan_ID = UsersPlans.Plan_ID group by UsersPlans.Plan_ID

#특정멤버의 일정들에서 방문한 국가리스트를 얻어온다 select Plan_Title as plan_title, Contents_Country as visitedCountryISO, Plan_EndChk as plan_endChk/*, Contents_City*/ from # 일정에서 특정멤버의 일정목록을 먼저 얻어와서 일정상세테이블과 조인하여 "특정 유저의 일정들의 상세목록"을 가져온다 (tbl_Plan_Detail join (select Plan_ID, Plan_Title, tbl_Plan.Member_ID as 일정만든유저, Plan_EndChk from tbl_Plan where tbl_Plan.Member_ID = #{memberID} )Member_Making_plan on tbl_Plan_Detail.Plan_ID = Member_Making_plan.Plan_ID join tbl_Contents on tbl_Plan_Detail.Contents_ID = tbl_Contents.Contents_ID ) #where tbl_Plan_Detail.Plan_ID =1 group by Contents_Country, Plan_Title, Plan_EndChk
